name: Aerodactyl
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.

poke_power.name: Unearth
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Helix Fossil, Dome Fossil, or Old Amber, show it your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can’t be used if Aerodactyl is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.
